law.catch_line: Penalty For Failure To Make Return For Corporate Franchise Tax
law.text: Any corporation, company or association, liable to taxation under section fifty-eight, neglecting to make the returns required by subsection (h) of section twelve of chapter sixty-two C, or refusing or neglecting, when required, to submit to the examinations provided for in section sixty-nine of this chapter, shall forfeit such sum not greater than two per cent upon the par value of its capital stock as the court may deem just and equitable.
